com.precog.client

Class DelimitedFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.precog.client.DelimitedFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Format

    public class DelimitedFormat
extends Object
implements Format
    A CSV format represents CSV files as values separated by a delimiter, a quotation character used to quote values, and a character to escape quotes within a quoted value. The most common formats are available as static members on Formats: Formats.CSV, Formats.TSV, and Formats.SSV.
    Author:
    Tom Switzer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DelimitedFormat(char delim)
      Construct a DelimitedFormat that uses delim as delimiter, '"' for quoted values, and '"' to escape quotes in a quoted value.
      DelimitedFormat(char delim, char quote, char escape)
      Constrcuts a DelimitedFormat that uses delim as a delimiter, quote to quote values, and escape to escape quotes within a quoted value.

      Returns the value delimiter of the CSV format.
      char getEscape()

      • DelimitedFormat

        public DelimitedFormat(char delim,
               char quote,
               char escape)
        Constrcuts a DelimitedFormat that uses delim as a delimiter, quote to quote values, and escape to escape quotes within a quoted value.
        Parameters:
        delim - the value delimiter to use
        quote - the quotation charater to use (eg. '"' or '\'')
        escape - the escape character to escape quotes in a quoted value
